roleset.name: eliminate
roleset.note: PHASE_OUT-V NOTES: You'll have to add in the particle "out" to the verb "phase" manuallyusing "A" in pbtool. (from phase.01-v)

example.name: automatically generated
example.text: The company said it-1 is in the process of *trace*-1 phasing out John Deere, its current source of production for midsized motor home chassis.
example.arg: John Deere , its current source of production for midsized motor home chassis

roleset.name: introduce in increments
roleset.note: PHASE_IN-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on WSJ. No Vncls. (from phase.02-v)

example.name: standard passive
example.text: The move will help the bank to keep up with [international solvency ratios]-1 being phased *trace*-1 in by the Bank for International Settlements .
example.arg: by the Bank for International Settlements
